name: Lucent (ArtFX School)
description:
Lucent is a contemplative puzzle game set in a dreamlike world of floating islands. You play as Lucent whose goal is to bring music back to his/her world. To do this, you must solve puzzles to activate an instrument and rebuild a monument.

Developer : ARTFX Promo 2021
